tos.section1Text: SeuraavaBussi Plus is a paid add-on service that provides access to real-time bus location data on the map. The service is intended for personal, non-commercial use.
tos.section2Text: The SeuraavaBussi Plus service uses open APIs provided by third parties, including Digitransit, ITS Factory, HSL, and Waltti.
tos.section2Bold: We do not own, control, or take responsibility for the operation, availability, or accuracy of these APIs.
tos.section3Text: The service is provided "as is" without warranties. TutorSwap Oy is not responsible for:
tos.section3Item1: The accuracy or timeliness of location data
tos.section3Item2: Malfunctions or changes in third-party APIs
tos.section3Item4: Damages resulting from the use or inability to use the service
tos.section3Item5: Missed connections or other consequences resulting from reliance on location data
tos.section4Text: Bus location data is estimates based on data provided by third parties. The data may be inaccurate, delayed, or incomplete. Users should always verify official schedules and be prepared for changes.
tos.section5Text: We do not guarantee uninterrupted service operation. Changes to third-party APIs may affect service functionality or lead to feature removal. In such cases, we are not obligated to provide refunds.
tos.section6MonthlyText: Charged monthly. You can cancel at any time, and the subscription will end at the end of the current billing period. Monthly payments are non-refundable.
tos.section6LifetimeText: The one-time payment grants access to the service as long as it remains operational. If you are not satisfied, you can request a full refund within 7 days of purchase by emailing
tos.section7Text: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the service or its features at any time. If the service is completely terminated, monthly subscriptions will stop being charged, but one-time payments will not be refunded.
tos.section8Text: Real-time location data is only available in areas where third-party APIs provide this information. Currently supported cities are Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Oulu, Jyväskylä, and Lahti. Location data is not yet available in other cities.
tos.section9Text: These terms are governed by Finnish law. Any disputes will be resolved in the Pirkanmaa District Court. Consumers always have the right to bring matters to their local district court or the Consumer Disputes Board.
tos.section11Text: By purchasing a SeuraavaBussi Plus subscription, you accept these terms of service and the service's privacy policy.

footer.aboutText: SeuraavaBussi.fi is a free service that shows real-time public transit departure times near you. The app automatically fetches information from the nearest stops and displays upcoming buses, trams, and trains in a clear list. You can also search for departures near any address or location.
footer.faq1Answer: The app uses your location or a searched address to find the nearest stops. Departure times are fetched in real-time from public transit APIs and updated automatically every 30 seconds.
footer.faq2Answer: Yes, departure times are based on real-time GPS tracking when available. If real-time data is not available, the scheduled departure time is shown.
footer.faq3Answer: Basic features of SeuraavaBussi.fi are free. We also offer paid features such as live map and faster bus updates.
footer.faq4Question: Can I use the app without location?
footer.faq4Answer: Yes, you can search for departures near any address or place using the search function.
